message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go at this point.  I'm happy to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob,  $13,000 is closer to what I had in mind, but I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price, given the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
